laws.suggestion: Modify the non-compete clause to include specific, reasonable duration, geographic scope, and activities prohibited, such as: "For a period of 2 years following termination, Employee will not engage in competing activities within a 50-mile radius of the Company's West Virginia offices.

review_notes.next_steps: Verify statute citations and effective dates
